channel.title: Lednerb on My cool new Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Lednerb on My cool new Blog

item.title: Support and Discussions
item.description: Support for this theme is provided through the Issues and Discussions sections of the project. Please use the Issues section if you would like to report a defect or bug. For any other requests, use the Discussions section. Please use the following guidelines if you want to start a discussion: For any questions regarding a specific feature, or if you need help using or customizing the theme, use the Questions & Answers (Q&A) category.

item.title: My Trip to Scotland
item.description: In June 2017 I’ve visited Scotland with my best friend for two weeks. We drove a lot through the beautiful countryside and saw a lot of different animals: cattle, deer, birds, dolphins, and sheep. Sheep everywhere! At one beautiful camping site, we saw cattle in fog in the very early morning and took a picture of it. The image now has the title “Rindviecher im Nebel”, a quite funny German phrase that means cattle in the fog.

item.title: Installing Bilberry Theme
item.description: You will find all information to setup this theme with your hugo site on the official Github Repository.
